meanings.definition: A dress that resembles a shirt in style and length.
meanings.sent1: She wore shirtdresses to work every day.
meanings.sent2: The store had a sale on shirtdresses this weekend.
meanings.sent3: Her collection of shirtdresses was so large, she needed a separate closet for them.
meanings.sent4: The rows of shirtdresses in the store looked like a colorful garden.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the shirtdresses felt like a gentle hug.

meanings.sent1: She shirtdresses elegantly for special occasions.
meanings.sent2: I often shirtdress when I want to feel comfortable and stylish.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally shirtdressed for a formal event, mistaking it for a suit.
meanings.sent4: She shirtdresses with confidence, knowing she looks good.
meanings.sent5: The actress shirtdressed for the movie premiere, stunning everyone with her outfit.
